0.1.name: wordpress/imdb-easy-movie-embed-ieme
0.1.description:
Inserts short movie info in your posts (poster, title, directors, actors, runtime, short review (plot), trailer). Uses http://www.imdb.com/ for serving data.

Configurable options

  • theme (look & feel)
  • box width and height
  • background color
  • font family and size

You can configure the look of the plugin by yourself by editing the style.css file in your plugin directory.

New in version 0.1.2.1:

  • minor bugs corrected

New in version 0.1.2:

  • language bug corrected

New in version 0.1.1:

  • global variables bug (WP 2.5 and above) fixed
